Summary 20+ years of recruiting experience working as a Recruiter as well as Managing a Recruiting Department. I have expertise in full-life cycle recruiting, sourcing support and working on diversity initiatives. 
I have extensive experience recruiting for the following roles: 
TECHNICAL (Software and Hardware Engineers, Design Engineers, Test and Validation Engineers, Automation Engineers and IT Professionals) 
SALES (Outside and Inside Sales Reps, Sales Engineers and Business Development Reps) 
EXECUTIVES (VP's, Directors, Managers) 
HEALTHCARE (Customer Center Reps, Supervisors and Administrative) 
As well as - Marketing professionals, co-op's/interns, and Executive Admins) 
 
I pride myself in building and maintaining relationships with my Internal clients (Hiring Managers) as well as my external clients (Candidates). 
 
Experience in finding passive and active candidates through networking, LinkedIn, resume mining, cold calling, career events, University relations and events, employee referrals etc.

Summary Technical Recruiter | Talent Acquisition 
 
LION | LinkedIn Open Networker (Never IDK) 
 
I have been a technical recruiter for the past ten years with companies such as Intel, HP and eBay. I specialize in Bay Area tech professionals and am currently hiring Camera and Imaging Engineers for Intel in Santa Clara, CA. 
 
Intel Corporation is the largest semiconductor manufacturer in the world and one of the most recognized brands. We manufacture chips for PCs, servers, mobile, next gen and wearable technologies. 
 
Have you ever wanted to work for one of the biggest and most exciting companies on the planet? 
Connect with me and let me know how I can help you! 
 
Follow me on Twitter @JoePeckTech 
joe.peck@intel.com 
480-723-7103

Sourced 12 key hires for Legal and Government affairs in first 6 months of employment while ramping up to learn the corporate culture and business group acumen. Four hires were high level executive positions and seven of the twelve were diverse candidates. Results led to a savings of $205,000 in external headhunter fees 
Built template library for candidate prescreening questions for implementation of the Taleo talent management solution. A library of over 9000 questions and answers was created along with the corresponding Individual templates for each job code and grade level. Despite system delays and data loss, key deliverables were met which resulted in the successful on-time launch of the new hiring tool. 
Worked with Hiring Programs Manager to revamp and streamline the Non-Diverse Offer Request Process which resulted in a reduction of the time to offer for each candidate from 3-4 weeks to less than one week thus making the Software & Solutions Group more competitive 
Took on additional duty of the Staffing Super User team member where I was responsible for resolving hiring tool issues for hiring managers and candidates. As a result, response time to customers was reduced from 48-96 hours to same day

• Applicant Tracking Systems: ADP Virtual Edge, Eease, Taleo, Kenexa Webhire, TMS (Monster) Experience Sr. Technical Recruiter, ProActive Talent Solutions Intel Corporation April 2015  – Present (5 months) Santa Clara, CA I am a Diversity Recruiter and VIP Advocate with the Intel ProActive Talent Solutions team. Our goal is to hire the strongest, experienced candidates we can find to join our technical hiring teams in areas such as Hardware, Software, Firmware, Validation and Verification Engineering.  
 
Typical roles include: 
 
- Software Engineers 
- Developers 
- Process Engineers 
- Design Engineers 
- QA Engineers 
- Test Automation 
- Verification engineers (pre-silicate) 
- Validation Engineers (post-silicate) 
- Architects 
- Technical Leads 
 
Technical competencies include (but are not limited to): 
 
- Java (JQuery, JUnit, Javascript, J2EE, JSON, etc.), Linux, Perl, C++, C#, Mobile Apps, Selenium, White Box Testing, Black Box Testing, BIOS, programming for Wearable technology, etc. (this list is evolving as we build it) 
 
I look for professionals with 2-10 years of field experience (post-degree), and typical candidates have at least completed a Bachelor's Degree or higher. 
 
Target Locations include (but not limited to):  
 
- Hillsborough, OR 
- Folsom, CA 
- Santa Clara, CA 
- Phoenix, AZ 
- Austin, TX 
- Albuquerque, NM 
- Hudson, MA  
- San Diego, CA 
 Web 4.0 Technical Recruiter and Career Consultant selfemployed July 2007  – Present (8 years 2 months) Home office, or onsite - SF Bay Area Web 4.0 Technical recruiter & career consultant offering the following services: 
- Candidate search and selection (active and passive) 
- Pre-screening, pre-qualification, job spec negotiation 
- Web 2.0, 3.0, and 4.0 Networking and outreach strategies 
- Data mining for job / project / candidate leads 
- Job search planning, consulting and mentoring 
- Resume / Job Description writing, review, and publishing 
- Candidate branding and marketing 
 
I have successfully sourced and hired (partial list): 
======================================

Summary I work with managers in our Technical Computing Group which is part of Intel's Data Center Group (DCG), to identify and hire engineers who want to join us in blazing a path toward new innovation, discovery and competitiveness with our supercomputing vision and products. 
 
I'm looking for senior hardware and software High Performance Computing (HPC) talent to work on next generation products for high performance interconnects. To learn more about our Fabric Development team, visit http://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/infiniband/truescale-infiniband.html  
 
I'm also looking for engineers with experience in design and validation of photonic devices, optical transceivers, and thermal mechanical design. To learn more about our Silicon Photonics team, visit: http://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/jobs/campaigns/photonics-jobs.html?wapkw=silicon+photonics  
 
Here's the bottom line: if you are ready to start blazing a new path for yourself, then apply online at www.intel.com/jobs, and contact me today at charles.c.hyder@intel.com  
 
By the way, did you know: 
• The new world's fastest supercomputer is powered by Intel® Xeon Phi™ coprocessors and Intel® Xeon® processors, delivering twice the speed of the previous leader.  
• Intel processors power more than 80 percent of all systems on Top500 list of world's most powerful supercomputers including 98 percent of new listed systems. 
• Intel Silicon Photonics technology is revolutionizing computing platforms by using light (photons) to move huge amounts of data at very high speeds with extremely low power over a thin optical fiber rather than using electrical signals over a copper cable. 
• Bringing optical technology into the computing industry will transform the way computers work and the value that they provide to people. Summary As a full-cycle recruiter, I currently support Intel's Datacenter Group (DCG). It’s an exciting time for DCG and we’re looking for talented people to join us! DCG is a rapidly growing and highly successful organization, in fact their profits make up over 50% of Intel’s earnings!  
 
What do we do? The Datacenter Group drives new products and technologies from high-end co-processors for supercomputers to low-energy systems for datacenters, as well as solutions for cloud and big data. The group is a worldwide organization that develops the products and technologies that power nine of every 10 servers sold worldwide.  
 
Current open positions: 
 
- Mechanical-Thermal Design Engineers (759562, 756757) 
- Hardware Power Design Engineer (759515) 
- Board Design Engineers (759455) 
- Senior Analytics Software Engineer (759288) 
- Principal Analytics Software Engineer (759287) 
- Signal Integrity Engineer (752162) 
 
Come and be a part of this amazing organization and company!! 
 
Visit our jobs website and apply today – http://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/jobs/job-search/advanced-job-search.html
